name: mole_fraction_of_cfc13_in_air
description: "Mole fraction" is used in the construction "mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox_expressed_as_nitrogen". The chemical formula for CFC13 is CF3Cl. The IUPAC name for CFC13 is chloro(trifluoro)methane.
